credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Christ and the Virgin with Patron Saints of Pistoia
medium: Brush and gray wash, pen and ink, black chalk, white heightening on buff paper.
description: Attributed to Gimignani by Nicolas Turner and Ursula Pace.  According to the latter, preparatory for now destroyed  picture formerly in the Cathedral of Pistonia.  Saints may be Lucy, Magdalene, St, James, Ursula, Hatto, and Sabastian.
name: Drawing
